prerequisite: Only a binder can take this paragon path.
name: Master Binder
text: Your adventuring success demonstrates the wisdom of your having set out along a dark path. You have accomplished much with the help of your unseen allies. Now, even greater understanding and power are yours to seek and seize.

features.binder'sAction(11thLevel): You gain a paragon path feature associated with your pact
features.binder'sFavor(11thLevel): You gain a paragon path feature associated with your pact
features.level11PactEncounterPower(11thLevel): You gain an encounter attack power associated with your pact
